about_the_game:
This app lets you make a one-piece (texture) of a 3D avatar made with ‘’Cecil HenShin App” or ”VRoid Studio”.
Import VRM and dress up!

DressMaker is the application that allows you to create and output textures compatible with VRoid Studio and ‘’Cecil HenShin App”.

You can output a VRM format file while wearing the dress you created.

You can create your own original dress by arranging the designs in the app, even if you can't draw a picture.

【DressMaker Pro】NOW ON SALE!





”This app is for designing the dresses for Vroid onepiece."
Use this app with VRoidStudio!

What is the Cecil HenShin App?
Cecil HenShin is a 3D avatar maker that is developed by Virtual Youtuber, Suzuki Cecil.
The avatars you create can be export in VRM format and used in various VRM-enabled applications.

Do you wanna add "kawaii" items on your VRM？
【ItemShop】NOW ON SALE!

You can create your own original dress by arranging the designs in the app, even if you can't draw a picture.

name: DressMaker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA　GeForce GTX 1070 同等以上
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Tested in this environment.

short_description: This app lets you make a one-piece (texture) of a 3D avatar made with ‘’Cecil HenShin App” and ”VRoid Studio”. Import VRM and dress up!
